name: Dorugamon
effect: [Opponent's Turn] While you have another Digimon in play with [X-Antibody] in its traits, or a card with [X-Antibody] in its traits is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, this Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)
digivolve_effect: [All Turns] While this Digimon has [X-Antibody] in its traits, it gets +1000 DP.
